pageContext.claim: “Wacko John Bolton’s 'exceedingly tedious' (New York Times) book is made up of lies & fake stories. Said all good about me, in print, until the day I fired him. A disgruntled boring fool who only wanted to go to war. Never had a clue, was ostracized & happily dumped. What a dope!”
pageContext.analysis: Bolton worked for Trump 17 months, longer than any other national security adviser. Bolton insists he resigned. Trump often says he fired people who resigned if they later turn critical of him.
